parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the application group.

parameters.name: NewName
parameters.description: The new name of the application group.

parameters.name: OperationName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration update operation.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The JSON string that consists of a set of parameters. Default value: {}.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Set the value to cn-hangzhou.
